main event: A bright light observed in the sky over Dayton, Ohio on March 24, 1964, for approximately 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to be oval in shape., It changed color from white to green during the observation., The sighting lasted a significant duration of about 45 minutes., The observer reported that the object made no sound., The object was visible at night after a storm, indicating unusual atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: bright oval object changing color in the sky
